thread.title: Dylan DiSabato
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Dylan DiSabato

author: Dylan DiSabato
title: Dylan DiSabato
text: I was told about LTB by my friend so I ordered one. Let me just say this is probably the best money I've ever spent on fishing gear. I got lures that I would never spend the money on at the store. I even got a free live target crankbait! I wanted another one but when my new order was automaticly placed I didn't have the chance to put in a promo code so I emailed the LTB staff. Nichole was of great help and I'm externally happy she was able to help me out. She really knows what she is doing and may have just helped me catch my personal best. Thanks Nichole!!
